faq.title: Our Comprehensive curriculum, Designed for professionals

items.title: What You Will Learn
items.subtitle: Lead Weekend is an intensive 10-hour leadership experience designed to equip ambitious professionals with essential leadership skills. Spread across three days in vibrant Barcelona, the course combines expert guidance with practical learning to help you become an effective and inspiring leader.

panel1.question: Who can attend these courses?
panel1.answer: Our courses are designed for professionals at all levels seeking to enhance their skills and advance their careers.

panel2.question: Where are the courses held?
panel2.answer: We offer courses in premium venues located in major European cities, easily accessible and equipped for effective learning.

panel3.question: Are the courses online or in-person?
panel3.answer: Currently, our courses are held in-person to maximize engagement and hands-on experience.

panel4.question: What is included in the course fee?
panel4.answer: The fee covers all training sessions, materials, venue access, lunch, airport transportation (if applicable), and a certificate of completion.

panel5.question: Is there a certificate provided?
panel5.answer: Yes, all participants receive a certificate upon successfully completing the course.

company.description: Learnix connects learners from the Middle East and Africa with expert European trainers. Build real skills and earn recognized certifications in tech, business, and more.

whyUs.title: WHY Choose us?
whyUs.description: Discover why Next-Gen AI Summit is the must-attend event for AI professionals, innovators, and industry leaders.

1.title: Cutting-Edge Insights
1.description: Gain firsthand knowledge from top AI experts and pioneers shaping the industry.

2.title: Hands-On Learning
2.description: Participate in interactive workshops, live demos, and deep-dive sessions to sharpen your skills.

3.title: Exclusive Networking
3.description: Connect with AI leaders, investors, startups, and fellow professionals at curated networking events.

4.title: Innovation Showcase
4.description: Explore groundbreaking AI solutions, from emerging startups to tech giants redefining the future.

courseOverview.title: Course overview
courseOverview.description: Lead instructor is a former Apple designer with extensive experience designed to equip ambitious professionals with essential leadership skills. Spread across three days in vibrant Barcelona, the course combines expert guidance with immersive learning to help you step into leadership.

pricing.paymentNote: We can split the payment at your convenience
